00037 #include "egs_shape_collection.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 EGS_ShapeCollection::EGS_ShapeCollection(const vector<EGS_BaseShape *> &Shapes,
00042     const vector<EGS_Float> &Probs, const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00043     EGS_BaseShape(Name,f), nshape(0) {
00044     int n1 = Shapes.size(), n2 = Probs.size();
00045     if( n1 < 2 || n2 < 2 || n1 != n2 ) {
00046         egsWarning("EGS_ShapeCollection::EGS_ShapeCollection: invalid input\n");
00047         return;
00048     }
00049     nshape = n1;
00050     shapes = new EGS_BaseShape* [nshape];
00051     EGS_Float *dum = new EGS_Float [nshape], *p = new EGS_Float [nshape];
00052     for(int j=0; j<nshape; j++) {
00053         shapes[j] = Shapes[j]; shapes[j]->ref(); p[j] = Probs[j]; dum[j] = 1;
00054     }
00055     table = new EGS_AliasTable(nshape,dum,p,0);
00056     delete [] dum; delete [] p;
00057 }
00058 
00059 extern "C" {
00060 
00061 EGS_SHAPE_COLLECTION_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape* createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00062         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00063     if( !input ) {
00064         egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): null input?\n"); return 0;
00065     }
00066     vector<EGS_BaseShape *> shapes;
00067     vector<EGS_Float> probs;
00068     EGS_Input *ishape;
00069     while( (ishape = input->takeInputItem("shape",false)) ) {
00070         EGS_BaseShape *shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape);
00071         if( !shape )
00072             egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): got null shape\n");
00073         else shapes.push_back(shape);
00074         delete ishape;
00075     }
00076     vector<string> snames; int err = input->getInput("shape names",snames);
00077     if( !err && snames.size() > 0 ) {
00078         for(unsigned int j=0; j<snames.size(); j++) {
00079             EGS_BaseShape *shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(snames[j]);
00080             if( !shape ) egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): no shape "
00081                   "named %s exists\n",snames[j].c_str());
00082             else shapes.push_back(shape);
00083         }
00084     }
00085     err = input->getInput("probabilities",probs);
00086     bool ok = true;
00087     if( err ) {
00088         egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): no 'probabilities' input\n");
00089         ok = false;
00090     }
00091     if( shapes.size() < 2 ) {
00092         egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): at least 2 shapes are "
00093             "needed for a shape collection, you defined %s\n",shapes.size());
00094         ok = false;
00095     }
00096     if( shapes.size() != probs.size() ) {
00097         egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): the number of shapes (%d)"
00098             " is not the same as the number of input probabilities (%d)\n");
00099         ok = false;
00100     }
00101     for(unsigned int i=0; i<probs.size(); i++) {
00102         if( probs[i] < 0 ) {
00103             egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): probabilities must not"
00104                   " be negative, but your input probability %d is %g\n",
00105                   i,probs[i]); ok = false;
00106         }
00107     }
00108     if( !ok ) {
00109         for(unsigned int j=0; j<shapes.size(); j++)
00110             EGS_Object::deleteObject(shapes[j]);
00111         return 0;
00112     }
00113     EGS_ShapeCollection *s = new EGS_ShapeCollection(shapes,probs,"",f);
00114     s->setName(input); s->setTransformation(input);
00115     return s;
00116 }
